subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matt Kuchar handed the defending champion, Hunter Mahan, a 2-and-1 defeat in the final of the Accenture Match Play Championship at the Golf Club in Marana, Ariz.
snippet: Matt Kuchar handed the defending champion, Hunter Mahan, a 2-and-1 defeat in the final of the Accenture Match Play Championship at the Golf Club in Marana, Ariz.
